sources.title: Harpoon | Full Movie | Survival Thriller
sources.description:
Rivalries, dark secrets, and sexual tension emerge when three best friends find themselves stranded on a yacht in the middle of the ocean desperate for survival.
2019.  Stars: Munro Chambers, Chris Gray, Emily Tyra

metadata.Plot: Three friends - Jonah, Richard and Sasha - go for a cruise on a yacht. Richard and Sasha are in a relationship but Sasha recently cheated on Richard with Jonah...and Richard knows. The friendship is under pressure, making for a tense journey.
metadata.Actors: Munro Chambers, Chris Gray, Emily Tyra
